overview: You can always lose yourself in a good story; a loving romance or a nail-biting thriller, but for these guys, there's nothing like some Stiff Cock Tales to get their attention! Turning the heat up, these hot-bloodied and impulsive guys already know the ending to these stories it's the beginning and the bit in the middle that piques more than just their interest. Fifty Shades Of Gray has nothing on these tales of eroticism and Dorian Gray wouldn't be a handsome straight man for long once he got a little taste of what these boys have to offer!
title: Stiff Cock Tales
